legendaryGroup.name: Face Collector
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the face collector takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; The face collector can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: {@spell Pyrotechnics|xge} is casted on a point of choice within the lair that the collector can see.
All creatures within the lair are illuminated by a spotlight. Invisible creatures lose the {@condition invisible} until the next initiative count 20.

Smoke covers the face collector and a hooked creature that is within 5 feet of it and quickly vanishes. Creatures without truesight within the lair can't distinguish the face collector from the hooked creature.

regionalEffects: The region containing the collector's lair is tainted by the collector's acts and his desire of performance, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Within 5 miles of the lair, corpses of humanoids without face can be found lying around.

Within 51 mile of the lair, creatures that share a language with the face collector will hear a voice inside their heads and must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a a creature must spend their reaction by dropping what they are holding and applaud with admiration for the collector's act, whenever they see the face collector hook a creature with his face hook.
